Package dog.giraffe.util

Class ColorConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • dog.giraffe.util.ColorConverter
  • public class ColorConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    RGB<->HSV/HSL color conversion. The instances of this class are mutable and not thread-safe.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      double blue
      The blue component of the color in the RGB color space.
      double green
      The green component of the color in the RGB color space.
      double hue
      The hue component of the color in the HSV/HSL color space.
      double lightness
      The lightness component of the color in the HSL color space.
      double red
      The red component of the color in the RGB color space.
      double saturationLightness
      The saturation component of the color in the HSL color space.
      double saturationValue
      The saturation component of the color in the HSV color space.
      double value
      The value component of the color in the HSV color space.

      Convert HSV coordinates to RGB.
      void rgbToHsvAndHsl​(double blue, double green, double red)
      Convert RGB coordinates to HSV and HSL.

    • Field Detail

      • blue

        public double blue
        The blue component of the color in the RGB color space. Valid values are 0 to 1.

      • green

        public double green
        The green component of the color in the RGB color space. Valid values are 0 to 1.

      • hue

        public double hue
        The hue component of the color in the HSV/HSL color space. Valid values are 0 to 2*PI.

      • lightness

        public double lightness
        The lightness component of the color in the HSL color space. Valid values are 0 to 1.

      • red

        public double red
        The red component of the color in the RGB color space. Valid values are 0 to 1.

      • saturationLightness

        public double saturationLightness
        The saturation component of the color in the HSL color space. Valid values are 0 to 1.

      • saturationValue

        public double saturationValue
        The saturation component of the color in the HSV color space. Valid values are 0 to 1.

      • value

        public double value
        The value component of the color in the HSV color space. Valid values are 0 to 1.
